name: McDonald's Collab Meal Game
description:
Create your own McDonald's Collab Meal üçî


Ever wanted to create your own personal McDonald's collaboration meal? What about creating it for your favorite celebrity, character or pop culture icon?


Answer, yes? Then you're in the right place.



Overview


The McDonald's Collab Meal Game is all about creating a perfect collaboration meals for yourself and for the characters of your choosing.


Up to 6 players input their information and select a character or celebrity that they want to create a meal for. Then each player, using the menu item components, crafts the perfect meals to capture the essence of themselves and of the characters the players chose.


Once every meal is ready, players get to vote on which meal is the best representation of each character and show off their personal collaboration meals.



About this game


  • 6 Players
  • Takes ~1 hour
  • Uses current US McDonald's Items (Nov. 2020)
  • Easy to play
  • Great for teams üòä




Recommended to keep a 'main' file and to duplicate new games from there for ease of use playing more than once.


Also this is absolutely in no way associated with McDonald's in any way and is intended for entertainment purposes only.
